reviews.review: The Switch is great and it can be enjoyed by everyone in the family. The only thing I did not like about it is the built-in stand it has on the back. It's very flimsy, keeps coming off and when in use it tends to fall off very easily, so you're probably going to have to look for an additional stand for it to play on some occasions.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2021
reviews.name: LoveElectronics
reviews.title: the joycon drifts after using it for a week
reviews.review: The joycon is one of the worst product that Nintendo has sold.The drifting is terrible and starts after about a week playing with this Nintendo Switch. I already have to contact Nintendo regarding the joycon and it is a well known problem.The manufacturing and engineering needs to improve asap.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2021
reviews.name: Anita cox
reviews.title: Price
reviews.review: The price was the cheapest anywhere and didn't have to be on wait list there were enough to go around and options to buy used

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2021
reviews.name: C. Kalel
reviews.title: This made an excellent gift!
reviews.review: I was so happy to purchase this Switch for my adult daughter's birthday gift.This unit was easily set up, and has worked great for the last two months.So glad you had this one in stock on the day I wanted to buy one!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2020
reviews.name: R. Cisneros
reviews.title: Haven't been able to put it down...
reviews.review: I was not a believer. I'm a PlayStation guy...have been since PS1. Finally broke down and scooped up a Switch. This thing is a game changer. I never thought I would WANT to play a game in bed. Now I can't stop. Being able to play on my big screen TV and then continue the game anywhere else is something I never knew I would enjoy doing but it really is amazing. And the amount of exclusive titles seals the deal - Breath of the Wild is one of the best games ever made, Smash Bros Ultimate and Mario Kart are perfect for big groups hanging out.It's worth every penny.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2021
reviews.name: Tiffany
reviews.title: Kickstand won’t open! Can’t get the The Storage!
reviews.review: I got everything I needed and it all was amazing. I wanted this for my Birthday and it was my first Nintendo switch. I opened the box and I was happy getting a Nintendo Switch and I even got a Micro disc storage for my games I was going to download and found out it was behind the stand and I tried so hard to open it but it was stuck and did not budge. I am so disappointed. The kickstand will not open no matter how hard I tried to open it. It was a defect.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2022
reviews.name: Byron
reviews.title: Hmm
reviews.review: Screen was broken and right joycon had drift… but was able to return with no problem!!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2020
reviews.name: Melissa Muñoz
reviews.title: Turn it on problems.
reviews.review: The media could not be loaded. Hello, we have 9 months with the Nintendo and it has a problem to turn in on. If we want to turn it on we have to 🔌 it. As you can see in the video. I am going to try to contact Nintendo so see the one year warranty. The chat is not available, o will try to call them.I sent the nintendo to repair and it was fast, great service

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2021
reviews.name: toku
reviews.title: Too much fun.
reviews.review: I want to give a 1 star review considering how much I play since I've gotten the switch. But I realized that it wouldn't be fair. Just because I have trouble putting the console down due to awesome graphics,the ability to both play on the go and on the screen at home seamlessly,and have hours of fun doesn't mean I should blame them for my all night game sessions and Tom foolery. So,they get the unbiased opinion in my thoughts on the console.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2020
reviews.name: S
reviews.title: One of my switch Joy con not work
reviews.review: One of my switch Joy concannot work, cannot charge, the other one work fine. I contact the customer service, they cannot fix it and change it for the covid 19, they said their customer service is closed, and will contact me when it open, till now not response at all. But I donot want to return it for the specially time,my kids already play it. Very sad.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2021
reviews.name: William
reviews.title: Awesome buy
reviews.review: My switch arrived on time undamaged. Upon opening i confirmed this is the switch with the better battery. My only issue is with the lack of interesting games on the switch but that is a nintendo issue not a seller issue. Definately buy one

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2022
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Dock doesn't work and kick stand came broken
reviews.review: The switch itself seems to work for now but upon arrival I noticed the kick stand was broken and I am unable to use it as intended. Also, the tv dock station does not work at all. I tried to use different HDMI cables and also a different type c charger and nothing gets the dock to work. Depending on the seller taking care of these issues I will have to leave a 2 star review because the main reason I bought the switch was to play games on a TV with a pro controller

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2019
reviews.name: PeteS
reviews.title: Always innovating, Nintendo has the best console this generation.
reviews.review: A Nintendo Switch with extended battery life? What's not to love? It's a no-brainer! Nintendo is always at the forefront of console innovation and they didn't miss a beat with the Switch. Want to play a game on your tv like a traditional console? Drop the Switch into the dock and game on in 1080p HD. Need to hit the road? Slide the Switch out of the dock and continue your gaming on the go in brilliant 720p HD. And I haven't even gotten into the built-in option for multiplayer gaming with the removable controllers. Like I said, cutting edge console innovation from Nintendo! Come for the innovative console, stay for the myriad of both cutting edge and nostalgia-inducing first party titles from Nintendo. Not into Mario and Link games? How about the largest library of quality Indie games and old-school games? No matter how you look at it, the Switch is where it's at!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2020
reviews.name: Deborah Knight
reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.review: Received it Saturday which was super fast considering all that’s going on. My dtr played it the whole weekend. She loves it! She wanted a grey but received a color one. They sent a card of apology and $10! So thoughtful. She was happy just to get one cause they are all gone in the store. A little pricey but we all pinched in so should could have it. Worth it!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2021
reviews.name: Marques Johnson
reviews.title: Broken
reviews.review: Quite working about a month after getting. I was going to return and realized I was 1 day late on the cut off to return. I emailed them and didn’t hear back. It appears the charging port has something wrong with it. It’s a lot of money for something to quit working shortly after getting it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2021
reviews.name: spazure
reviews.title: Wrong color but solid product
reviews.review: A little annoyed that this seller misrepresented the color (I got neon red/blue joycons instead of grey even though my order clearly said grey), but due to the supply issues with Switches I’m happy I got a switch at all… and it did come new in box and works flawlessly.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2020
reviews.name: Cristhian A.
reviews.title: Long wait but It worth it.
reviews.review: So it finally arrived it. I’m glad I ordered this before the lockdown, it took a long time due customs and delivery on my country but it’s finally here.It’s great, to be honest I was kinda scared but it works great, and of course it’s hard to get a Switch right now, so that makes me even happier because I bought just in time.The only thing I hate is that red-blue joycons model wasn’t available when I ordered this and this grey joycons are so boring. Anyway, I’m glad it’s here and working great.Hope more people can order this great product.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2020
reviews.name: Alex M
reviews.title: Great Gaming System
reviews.review: This thing is Awesome, its a portable handheld and home console....its so much fun. I am currently playing the legend of Zelda and the graphics are so nice. The controllers are kinda not that great so I recommend also buying an actual controller. Other than that everything else works great, battery life is very good and the quality of the screen is nice.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2020
reviews.name: John Bowersox
reviews.title: Great Family Fun
reviews.review: I've been looking to get a Switch for a while and thought that I had missed out due to the limited pandemic stock.Thanks Amazon for letting me purchase the device at the proper retail value rather than getting gouged.The product itself is well made, but I feel that the dock is rather cheap.I would also have liked a longer power cord.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2021
reviews.name: SFP
reviews.title: Great games, my kids love it, ... but unusable after 6 months
reviews.review: We've tried this twice. Spent a lot of money to make our kids happy. Twice broken within 6 months each. First time, it just wouldn't turn back on no matter what we tried (and we tried a lot of things, after a lot of research). Second time, control just wouldn't respond. Then it wouldn't turn on. Tired of spending money on things that seem to be deliberately designed to break often.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2019
reviews.name: tlod0813
reviews.title: Lot more fun than i thought
reviews.review: I come from PC and PlayStation gaming. The guys at work all talked about the switch and convinced me to get one. I got to say it's really cool. Great screen and very portable. Games library is not huge, but enough to be worth it. The hardware is not a powerhouse, but it doesn't need to be for these games. I wouldn't play Skyrim on it, or make it my only system, but it is a great addition.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2022
reviews.name: Tiger Gautreaux
reviews.title: Bad controls. Good system specifications. Good picture.
reviews.review: Xbox and Playstation consoles have certain layouts regarding their controllers; for a reason. A very good reason developed over find.This departure is counterintuitive and really bad engineering on their part.The hardware is good, the screen is shiny whatever

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2019
reviews.name: leo Vlaze
reviews.title: garbage durability don't buy.
reviews.review: the joy cons were having tons of problems 2 weeks after purchasing. this product has zero durability regardless of how careful you are. The games are almost all overpriced and i regret buying. especially since I was so excited to get it

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2022
reviews.name: b
reviews.title: Never again will i buy a Nintendo console
reviews.review: Somehow the user account management and networking are far worse than the WIIU.I suggested Nintendo perhaps hire a network engineer and IDM architect design those portions.It's like they fell out of the 1980s.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2020
reviews.name: ET
reviews.title: Great game console for both home and travel
reviews.review: Got this right before Christmas so our short family vacation during the holiday.I use it at home and away.We've got two extra controllers so the whole family can play together games like Mario Party, Mario Kart and etc.I own several Nintendo game consoles like GameCube and Wii.I think Nintendo’s switch is the most incredible system they’ve ever designed.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2021
reviews.name: Danica Reed
reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
reviews.review: it was originally supposed to come on feb but came a week after i purchased! i do not regret buying this whatsoever...! i’ve been using this ever since i got it. :) totally worth it! trust me

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2021
reviews.name: Jcsy
reviews.title: God it’s so good
reviews.review: I thought about giving it a 1 star for how addicted I am to it but I realized that’s just my toxic habits. Completely worth it, great as a gift or just for yourself, and so much versatility within the device and its additional systems.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2019
reviews.name: N. Wilson
reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review: Love the switch. Ultimate for the gaming dad. Game anywhere anytime.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2022
reviews.name: KC
reviews.title: Sent to a obvious US address with a UK style wall plug, rocks in a box theft.
reviews.review: Just going to spend more money on a proper US Wall charger... It's not like this retailer doesn't know what they are doing- no where does it mention the power supply plug is useless.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2021
reviews.name: Crumb
reviews.title: Worth it
reviews.review: Absolutely awesome! Been meaning to get a Switch for awhile so I went with this one. Works well, plays games very well, runs smoothly. I have been playing ACNH on the daily, amongst other games as well. Thanks so much Nintendo!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2020
reviews.name: PUBG
reviews.title: So hard to buy...
reviews.review: Because of the pandemic, the switch became so popular and so hard to buy. I waited for a long time to get one finally. It's a portable game player I would say but I cannot give it five star simply because I cannot play high end quality games like what I can play on Xbox and PS.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2021
reviews.name: Chris E
reviews.title: Great System
reviews.review: I bought this for me because the kids have their own and I wanted to be able to play too. I love that some RPG games are coming to Nintendo. I also like that it's portable and can take it on the go!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2021
reviews.name: Damarley
reviews.title: So much fun!!
reviews.review: This was the best purchase of 2020. Just which that I bought it sooner. So many fun games to play with friends and family. The ease of use is superior to anyproduct I’ve used before. You can take it on the go or easily connect it to you tv for a bigger screen. If you’re on the fence, just stop now and hit “buy now” you will not regret the purchase

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2021
reviews.name: LouRevue
reviews.title: Great handheld but returned for OLED model
reviews.review: Switch is great for old school gamers and casual ones too. Lots of fun games for this and the addition of the online subscription helps relive lots of old gaming memories.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2022
reviews.name: Francis Onyebuchi
reviews.title: It was in mint condition
reviews.review: Although the note said there were blemishes I did not notice any. Everything was in the box. Mint condition and very well kept. No manual but not a problem and it was clear the manual would not be included.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2021
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Brand new
reviews.review: Ordered the game console back in june for my daughter's birthday everything was brand new in the box at time of purchase the animal crossing version wasn't available so i went with the black colori didnt checked the serial numbers to see if it was the newest updated version it works great

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2019
reviews.name: Theta Zero
reviews.title: Great console.
reviews.review: Happy with the product.This is the revision with the improved battery life, which is a noticeable improvement.It also has slightly higher brightness and truer color compared to the past model due to a display upgrade.The only flaw to be aware of is the dock can scratch the screen, which makes a screen protector a must-have.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2021
reviews.name: Sue B.
reviews.title: Love it but wish I had instructions!
reviews.review: I am older and when I got it, I had absolutely no instructions. I had to look it up online and talk to my son in law just to figure out things. A company should not assume the user's age or experience.I really enjoy using it with my Ring game.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2020
reviews.name: J. May
reviews.title: Birthday Success!
reviews.review: This is all my son wanted for his birthday.Tried forever to "beat the bots" and actually get one and success with Amazon.Of course he loved it and I didn't have to pay double or triple the price to get one thanks to Amazon and zoolerts.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2021
reviews.name: George
reviews.title: Holds a great charge
reviews.review: My son loves this, it’s been many months since we purchased, it still works well and holds a charge a long time. The joysticks still work well and he has no issues with drifting. He enjoyed this color much more than the previous colors.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2020
reviews.name: darwin
reviews.title: RELIABLE SELLER
reviews.review: the nintendo came super quick! and for those asking if you’ll get the new version with the better battery, YES YOU DO! if you’re wondering why it looks different it’s because i installed different joycons. the seller is very reliable. i gifted the nintendo to my little brother. thank you!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2021
reviews.name: Tatianna
reviews.title: DONT BUY FROM THIS SELLER
reviews.review: the screen went out after a few uses. the seller said to send it back for refund. so i ended up just buying a new one from walmart because my son was not patient enough for a replacement from the seller. the seller now does not want to issue a refund because they got the screen to work and is demanding that i pay a restock fee. i would NOT recommend this seller. it is not my fault that i was sold a bad product and i no longer want it. who wants a game where the screen is going to keep going out & works when it wants to ?!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2021
reviews.name: happycat99
reviews.title: Awesome Switch grip!
reviews.review: This is an awesome grip which doubles as a stand for the Nintendo switch. It’s ergonomic, super comfortable, and is made of quality materials. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2020
reviews.name: C
reviews.title: lots of family fun
reviews.review: we love out nintendo switch.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2020
reviews.name: Mitize
reviews.title: Even adults are recommending to play the switch to fellow adults!
reviews.review: Easy to set up. No need to buy a SD card unless you are planning to download games right away. Battery last for a long time. Would recommend over slim due to being able to play on a TV among other benefits for just a bit more money. Recommend for kids,teens and adults alike.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2020
reviews.name: Tiffany
reviews.title: Great product but $30. Promotion Useless & Amazon was useless to help!!:
reviews.review: My son loves the product BUT the reason I gave it only 3 stars, is because they offered a promotion for a $30 credit/gift card for buying the Switch & when I tried to use it, it came back as invalid & when I contacted Amazon about it, they were useless! So, I was never able to use the $30. Promotion!!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2021
reviews.name: Bob
reviews.title: Great console
reviews.review: Awesome console. So many great exclusive titles. The console is very versatile, you can play it in handheld mode, tabletop mode and on TV. I just wish the screen was a bit bigger and higher resolution than 720p, but I guess a lower resolution helps increase battery life, which is also important. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2021
reviews.name: Kandy Buesa
reviews.title: Joycons suck but great console
reviews.review: Great little console. I love the versatility of it and how you can play handheld or switch to the tv within seconds.My only issue is the joycons. They stopped working on the console in less than a year of having it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2021
reviews.name: Elijah
reviews.title: Worth it
reviews.review: Even though this was a small investment at my younger age, it was worth every last penny! I've used this everyday and i feel as though it has gotten my closer to my friends i don't see often. It's definitely a little pricy but if you like gaming or like playing games with your friends, this is definitely it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2021
reviews.name: Corey W.
reviews.title: Fantastic upgrade from Lite
reviews.review: Two biggest things, it works just fine so far, and it's fun. I got the switch lite during Christmas of last year, and was always irritated by how some of the games were so squished, like Hades or NSR, and playing skyrim was just not fun due to the size and controls. After getting this, it's been so much better to play games on, and hooks up great to my tv!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2021
reviews.name: rula kdra
reviews.title: Worth the buy
reviews.review: I'm so glad I purchased one! I was using my sister's and realized animal crossing is so much fun than Sims. My niece loves just dance 2021. I can't wait to purchase more games

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2020
reviews.name: Susan Nilson
reviews.title: Not sure it was new
reviews.review: The package arrived with scotch tape holding it closed.This made me wonder if it was new or not (it was advertised as new).I open the box and most of the packaging looked new.The only thing missing was the screen protector that comes on new screens that you have to peel off.Other than that, everything looked like it was new.We did plug it in and made sure it turns on but since it is a Christmas gift, did not set it up.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2022
reviews.name: Alexis Caldwell
reviews.title: Works. Came fast. One joy con didn't work.
reviews.review: Pros:1. Shipped fast2. The system itself was in good condition and workedCons:1. The right joy con was defective. I had to go purchase a new joy con pack which was $85 just so I could get the system working.Summary:I would buy again but hesitantly. Not all parts may come working so buyer beware.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2021
reviews.name: momma1020
reviews.title: Clean, new, but not what i ordered
reviews.review: Great I love my switch but my biggest complaint is that I ordered black joycons and was sent red and blue ones. Its very much a first world problem, but it’s disappointing especially when you order something in this price range that youve waited for and saved months for.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2020
reviews.name: Brian
reviews.title: Great system, predatory and misleading sellers. Beware.
reviews.review: I gave this item one star for a very specific reason. My purchase was supposed to be a brand new Grey Switch. When I received it, the box was already open and had obviously been repackaged because there was dead skin on the joy sticks.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2020
reviews.name: Movie Fan
reviews.title: You get what you pay for: excellent
reviews.review: A tremendously well designed platform for gaming. I do wish it had more educational abilities so I could blend both education and gaming for my nephew. But given its design intentions, it met all of them spectacularly well! Truly an amazing achievement. Would be nice if it were less expensive.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2021
reviews.name: cirdanshand
reviews.title: Protect your customers investments
reviews.review: Seller stated Switch was new in pack and that was exactly how it arrived. All of the contents were accounted for. I am disappointed in the shipping packaging, it could have used some work as the console was resting against the side of a slightly bigger box that was damaged on arrival. I will give some leadway because its being shopped across country. One of the 3 bubble wraps was under inflated, granted it could be from the shipping process too, but please try to better protect peoples investments. I would rather you use to much than not enough.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2019
reviews.name: Pablo Pfeiff
reviews.title: Hijos
reviews.review: Muy bueno diversión

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2019
reviews.name: Castlemaid
reviews.title: Concerned if console is “new”
reviews.review: Im enjoying it so farMy problem is that the box came damaged, and all the bags insite were loosely open, im not sure if thats just how it ships, or yet i was shipped another “new” item that was most certainly used. my concern being that there were NO stickers holding the box closed

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2021
reviews.name: lora
reviews.title: Very happy with this switch
reviews.review: My son loves this. It was delivered 2 days earlier than listed. So that was great!!! It came with an HDMI cable and I wasn’t expecting that. Overall very happy with this Switch and delivery .

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2019
reviews.name: RMS
reviews.title: Must Have for Kiddos
reviews.review: I understand that many of us like to limit screen time for our kids, but the hand-eye skills kids learn with these child friendly games are very good. Buying these for my nieces and nephews as well. We just don't tell them you can disconnect it from the tv and use them in the car :)

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2021
reviews.name: Bee Elm
reviews.title: Bad customer service
reviews.review: Beware when purchasing this item. I received a defective item , there was a blue line down the screen, so I contacted customer service. I then returned the item and was charged a restocking fee. Even though no restocking fee is mentioned on this item, it also I not the consumers fault for reviving a defective piece. Will purchase another Nintendo switch but definitely not from here .

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2020
reviews.name: Donvaria
reviews.title: Awesome gift!
reviews.review: I bought this as a birthday gift for my boyfriend. It is worth every penny. It was a surprise and he absolutely loves it. It has so many features and cool games. I'm not much of a gamer but it's so beat especially how the sides come off and become consoles. What blew me away was when he connected it to the tv and played on the big screen. I am so pleased at this purchase and he's over the moon about it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2019
reviews.name: Runesong
reviews.title: Xmas will be awesome
reviews.review: Its a good system but wow it cost a lot. but the games have reduced a bit so that helps. Regardless there was a little boy who nver stopped asking for one lol. Its gonna be fun to watch him open it up.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2019
reviews.name: The Connery
reviews.title: Fun to be playing Nintendo again.
reviews.review: I haven’t owned a Nintendo in over 10 years. I purchased this because I wanted to play games with my daughter on her Switch. That said, I now gravitate towards the Switch over my Xbox. There is just something appealing about the Nintendo art style and quality of their games.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2019
reviews.name: Nancey R. Jones
reviews.title: Best Nintendo console I've had
reviews.review: This system is so much fun to use. Battery life is great- the first night I had it I played for almost 6 hours with no issue. It switches seamlessly from handheld to docked. Good price for what you get.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2021
reviews.name: Fae
reviews.title: Quarantine 2020 Life-Saver
reviews.review: I bought this in late 2019 and it saved my life during quarantine. Best purchase I've made in years. The quality of the console exclusive games is absolutely exquisite. I literally gasped when I first fired up Breath of the Wild on it. This is a console for literally anyone and anybody.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2019
reviews.name: DanaEFox
reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.review: My oldest son wanted one of these last Christmas, but didn't get one...so my younger son decided he should have it for his birthday.HE LOVES IT!!!!All the games he USED to play when HE was 12 and 13....

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2021
reviews.name: Curt A. Hodapp
reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review: My wife and I had a Nintendo NES when we were dating in the late 80s. We were looking for an old system or a knockoff and did not like the cost or the reviews. So we decided to purchase an Switch and downloaded the old games we played. Best purchase we made in year's.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2021
reviews.name: KKs review
reviews.title: Dock not working
reviews.review: The dock did not work properly from the first day, Had to put a small paper underneath the switch to lift it up a little bit, so that it connected. After an year, even that stopped working.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2021
reviews.name: James
reviews.title: Best console of it's generation
reviews.review: I love the multifunctionality of the console. Handheld, tablet, or TV, it's easy to set up and play. It's got a great library of family friendly games that anyone can pick up and enjoy. Nintendo really has done a great job.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2021
reviews.name: Rayac4750
reviews.title: Great buy
reviews.review: Glad i took a chance and bought this on amazon. It is a v2 switch with the better battery life. Box was brand new with everything in it's place.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2021
reviews.name: D. salas
reviews.title: Fast shipping and great product
reviews.review: The shipping came in 2 days early and was exactly as advertised. Couldn't be happier with this purchase.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2022
reviews.name: Virginia Tarrago
reviews.title: Usado
reviews.review: Compre el producto viendo las fotos y el precio y nunca percibí que no era original, que era usado.Cuando lo recibo veo que no está en su casa y recién ahí me doy cuenta.No deberían publicar productos usados con las mismas fotos de los productos nuevos, generan confusión y es propaganda engañosa.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2020
reviews.name: Jackie
reviews.title: Happy with purchase
reviews.review: I bought the switch and sd card bundle. Arrived almost 2 weeks early, before Christmas (not that it mattered in my case), undamaged, and at regular price. Very satisfied with purchase.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2022
reviews.name: Mbaye
reviews.title: It’s in good shape
reviews.review: The media could not be loaded. I like it so much I think you would injoy it to

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2019
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: I held out and I shouldn't have
reviews.review: Very well done. Kinda taken back at the durability and power of this unit for being a handheld. Was reluctant to buy because I thought it would chintzy but no, this thing is legit. If you have been holding out on getting one of these, dont. Seriously my favorite console now.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2020
reviews.name: Swauncyl
reviews.title: finally found it at the original price
reviews.review: I love this Nintendo Switch. After 6 months i finally found it at the original price. And i am on it everyday. Bigger then i tough but no complaints.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2020
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Most current product
reviews.review: Love that it is the newest software version. The local stores had Nintendo Switches at a cheaper price or bundled but they were all the older software version. So glad I bought it throigh Amazon and have the most current product as many store associates were not knowledgeable. Highly recommend as autistic son loves it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2019
reviews.name: Sánchez
reviews.title: Total mentira
reviews.review: El producto muy bien , pero en el momento de la compra venía una oferta de $30 dólares de regalo , era sólo una propaganda para llamar la atención al comprador , porque no sé respeto la oferta , era una gran mentira

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2021
reviews.name: D m
reviews.title: Stopped working
reviews.review: I purchased this March 11 2021It has completely stop workingIt will not charge at allIs there a warranty for itThanks

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2020
reviews.name: Jose Gomez Jr.
reviews.title: New- Works as expected
reviews.review: Someone bought this as a gift for me and it works as expected. I’ve had it for 3 months now and haven’t encountered any problems. It connects to internet, came with all the proper parts with the new and proper packaging, and runs smoothly.With LEGOHarry potter, it will occasionally encounter and error and close the program (its a downloaded game I stead of game cartridge). Not sure if this will be consistent with future downloaded games, which is my one worry, but runs smoothly in all other aspects.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2022
reviews.name: Lindaspy
reviews.title: That it is accurate
reviews.review: Grandson was so excited he jumped up and down!!Thank you

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2020
reviews.name: TRACIE GILLETTE
reviews.title: Came earlier than promised
reviews.review: Great service. I couldn’t find the Nintendo switch anywhere for weeks. Decided to pay a little more and ordered it. The switch came 10 days sooner than the soonest promised date. It came new as promised and my daughter is loving it. Great seller.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2021
reviews.name: Savannah
reviews.title: Finally!
reviews.review: Came a day early, everything is in working order! I was hoping to find a animal crossing switch but with the scalpers I just went with the dark grey version. Excellent buy

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2021
reviews.name: Daniel C.
reviews.title: Super fun system
reviews.review: The Switch is just super fun. It was easy to set up. Just had flow the on screen instructions. I love that I can connect to my TV or remove ot from the dock and make ot portable. Great sound great graphics. The games re super fun play.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2020
reviews.name: Keli
reviews.title: Versatile, fun, user friendly.
reviews.review: Great system. Kids can’t get enough of it. Can purchase game cartridges or download from the internet. Recommend you buy an additional memory card and screen protector.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2021
reviews.name: Shopping Warrior
reviews.title: Great quality product!!
reviews.review: I got this for my son's 12th birthday. He loves everything about it. He thanks me constantly. I am so glad I chose this product!!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2020
reviews.name: Itsme
reviews.title: Improved battery life
reviews.review: It’s the Nintendo Switch!This was a present for my 6 year old.He loves playing on it.Battery life has noticeably improved over the first one (my 10 year old owns).Overall looks and plays the same.Joycons are cross compatible too.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2021
reviews.name: Jeremy P.
reviews.title: Damaged Goods
reviews.review: Hi, all of the components were in very good condition, except the right joycon thumbstick button was crushed in, so bad that it was inoperable...

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2020
reviews.name: DeeDee
reviews.title: New, fast delivery
reviews.review: This was bought as a gift. It arrived almost a week earlier than scheduled, new, in the box. My daughter is extremely happy with it. While it was priced higher than I was expecting, this was the only seller that had new ones in stock.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2021
reviews.name: Sam O
reviews.title: Waste of money
reviews.review: Used casually for a little over a year, switch doesn’t work right anymore. It randomly turns off, sometimes it won’t even turn on, the joycons have massive drift, all in all this switch is a piece of garbage.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2020

reviews.title: Disappointed, Frustrated & Returning Switch
reviews.review: Bought for daughter for her birthday, and upon setup and first use we were both completely dissatisfied, disappointed and frustrated with the entire experience! The controllers were very awkward to use individually, no instructions for purpose of strap clip on, and first run of Mario party the game was incredibly frustrating with the movement of each character (was like the stick on the controller was out of sync as we couldn’t get the character to walk straight ) the menus you couldn’t scroll left or right (using up cycled through each area) and on everytime it said use a specific button on screen and highlighted that button , it was another button to complete an action … registering for Nintendo online was annoying and paying .50c to register really? Overall never again with the switch , poorly designed, poorly thought after games, way to many menus and storylines before game play, way to many ways to get frustrated before even enjoying a game… wouldn’t recommend this to anyone yet alone a younger gamer… the old Wii was leaps and bounds easier and more enjoyable … the only positive was the portability however even that after 10 mins and downloading a new game was just ok, Xbox, PS5 with ease of controls and quickness to playing make them far superior even if not in the same console class…

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2020
reviews.name: MartineLynn
reviews.title: The best *Family* system on the market.
reviews.review: The Nintendo Switch is a by for that most convenient and versatile console on the market. And If you're reading this during the epidemic you may have to wait a little while to get one sadly.Let's make this simple:Pros:It can be used as a handheld for personal/travel and used in Dock mode (Like a standard console) seamlessly. (Note: This does not apply to the Switch Lite which is "handheld" only)Fun for kids and adults.Plenty of games on the online store.All the Nintendo classics you love. (Mario, Mario Cart, Zelda, etc...)More high-quality controller options than any other system.Cons:Official Nintendo controllers (Joycons or pro controller) are expensive.Joycons can be a little small when sharingOnline store. (Hard to find quality titles sometimes)Not the best online experience. (But it is only $20 for the year)Battery Life could be longer (Depending on model)A surprising thing has happened. I have a Playstation 4, XboxOne, and a PC. Yet somehow the Nintendo Switch has become the default console to play on. In fact, I found that I'm often time annoyed when a game I want to play isn't available for the machine.The ease of transportation is the leading factor here. You can play console-quality titles in bed, on the toilette (let's be honest, you're on your phone so why not?), in the back of a Uber/Cab/Plane, or while the family is watching TV. Also, the suspend function is nearly flawless allowing you to just hit the power button to pause the action and continue right where you left off for most games. (This doesn't work for online play of course)The graphics are not the best. This is after all the weakest of the three main systems and you'd never compare this to the PC. However; in order to keep this at an affordable price point cuts had to be made somewhere.If you have a family or are on the go this is likely the system for you. The only thing I'll say is this isn't the best system for sports games. So if that's your thing you may want to skip it, also the online play isn't the best as you have to use things like "friend codes" and gaining friends isn't so easy.last if you want to live a long full life stay away from ANIMAL CROSSING... you will seriously forget that you have to live a real-life! lol

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2022
reviews.name: Pamela M.
reviews.title: An Absolute Game Changer
reviews.review: I was given the Nintendo Switch as a gift 3 years ago. Having grown up with every Nintendo console since the classic NES, it was the last console to be added to the collection. At first I thought, as an adult with responsibilities, I might be too busy to sit down and play video games like the good old days. However, the Nintendo Switch has been an absolute game changer in the video game world. The console switches easily between handheld mode or docked mode, making it a breeze to go portable or be docked back to the TV. If you’re a Nintendo fan like I am, you might feel unsure about the controls, especially since this is the debut of the Joy-Con, but the controls still feel natural and intuitive when using the Joy-Cons in their various play modes. I’ve also noticed that the user interface in both the system menus and in the games, are simple enough to accommodate players of all ages, which means no one gets left out during family game night. One negative is the paid membership required to access online capabilities for many games. Even if you’re connected to the Wi-Fi that you probably already pay for, a yearly subscription for family members to be able to play together online from afar is $34.99. Nevertheless, I would still recommend this game console to both kids and the casual adult gamers with responsibilities, like myself. The graphics, portability, and usability will keep you fully immersed in the game and experience.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2019
reviews.name: The Examinators
reviews.title: Awesome device! Controllers are a bit small, but this is an absolute must buy!
reviews.review: For details as to how this item received the given rating, see below:Nintendo did an awesome job in creating a mobile device that connects to a television or other HDMI output. Compared to other systems, the online membership is far less inexpensive, however it does lack additional incentives (comparing to a PlayStation + subscription). It has many games available to download (or can be purchased via physical media). The catalog is extensive and with the online subscription you can get some retro gaming action!The ability to take this with you anywhere, have games downloaded, and be able to hook up to any video output is awesome! Nintendo nailed it with this system. The controls are a bit small (at least for adults), but this can be fixed with the Joy Con comfort grips or via 3rd party accessories.Pros:Portable.Long battery life.Extensive library of games.Docking station charges unit/controllers and allows external output.Easy to use and setup.Cons:Not backwards compatible with existing/owned titles.At this moment, unable to previous generation games for the Switch (unless ported over specific to Switch or via retro emulator for NES/SNES, but not for Wii U, 3DS, etc).Packaging had some plastic covers/wrappers.*Note, there are two ratings applied to the reviewed item. "Product rating" and "Packaging rating". The actual product will not be impacted by the packaging as these are two separate ratings.In regards to packaging, the following are contributing factors against the "Packaging rating":In an effort to globally reduce and promote less usage of plastic, any usage of plastic or non-environmentally safe packaging/products/material will be marked negatively.Single use items that do not biodegrade or cannot be easily recycled (see point above on plastics).The packaging rating is being introduced to help drive a shift to more sustainable and environmentally friendly resources.Visit examinators.com for more reviews!

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review: The switch and accessories are cheaply made. My first issue with the the system was the controls.... The controllers are insanely expensive and luckily my wife bought me a extra set of controls for my Christmas present when she bought the switch because within a couple months two of the 4 controllers stopped working. Looked it up and apparently alot of people were having this issue. But was deploying and really wasnt to worried about it. So got back from my deployment and tried to playmy switch on the dock and guess what that decided it wasn't going to work either, looked this up... Guess what alot of people had that same issue too. If I want to replace the dock and one set of controllers it would cost over half the price of the system. Every other system has expensive accessories but I can depend on them to work. But I do love the switch but hate the fact I can't use it on the TV to actually play games with my family which is half of the reason people buy this system... Other wise I would rather stick with my PlayStation for anything at home and only play my switch if I'm out of the house and have nothing to do.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2019
reviews.name: Ken
reviews.title: I like it.
reviews.review: I like this one a lot better than the switch lite. It's bigger, and the screen is much more colorful, and brighter. It also doesn't hurt my hands like the switch lite did after playing for a while. I think because the controls are a little bigger. The battery lasts a long time. I had to charge my switch lite 2-3 times to get the same play time out of it as this system.I play Mario Kart online for 2+ hours and still had 30% battery left. The next day I was able to get another 1.5 hours of Mario Kart off that last 30%. I ended up charging it at 16% because I didn't want to run the battery all the way down.This is the first Nintendo I've bought since the N64, and I'm glad I did. I'm having a lot of fun with it so far. I never liked any of the other systems (Game Cube, Wii, etc...) I did like the 3DS XL a lot, and this system replaced that one. I'm so glad it uses the older style game carts instead of discs. Makes me feel like I actually have a game again, like the N64, SNES, NES.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2020
reviews.name: 1CrazyLife4Me
reviews.title: Awesome for ALL ages and so many features!!
reviews.review: We have 6 kids who played on and loved the Xbox, only thing is I wanted more kid type games for them so we ended up buying a switch and then Immediately a second one for our other room because we loved it so much. Every day since they have rushed to get school done, so they can play on it. We homeschool. We love all the games, only thing we wished they had was Roblox for the switch as they love those games as well. Do wish they had a bigger selection of games and each game is pretty expensive but you can sometimes find better deals online on Nintendo’s website. Make sure if you want digital to get a bigger memory card. Maybe one day they will have Roblox available. We also loved that it is super easy to travel with so we bought a case to protect them and took them to grandma’s as she has nothing for the littler kids to do. What was even cooler is that you can set it up on its stand and play multiple player even without a TV screen which is amazing!!! So many cool things about it as you don’t need internet to play either, it can be played solo or with others. Also love the dance 2020 game as the whole family gets up and dances together. The parental control blocks are also a bonus!!! Not to mention Xbox family is double the cost so a year of family on the switch is very affordable at about half cost. The size is also very compact and small. I’ll share a pic as size comparison. Oh and we bought a screen protector as well as I was worried sliding it in and out of the console might scratch it. Hope this helps! Oh and the pic is of the same switch but different color joycons. The gray one is in the other room but I wanted to show you the compact size. So look for the blue and red gaming console next to clock. For size comparison our TV is a 65”.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2020
reviews.name: Esther
reviews.title: Not sure it's worth the hype
reviews.review: The Nintendo Switch has been extremely hyped up for me, so I finally gave in and bought one to play Animal Crossing and Ring Fit Adventure.PROS:- Nice console design - can play handheld, use the built-in stand to stand it on a table, or play it docked with a screen- Joy-con controllers are customizable - can get different colors. Interestingly, it also changes the value of the bundle, for example the Animal Crossing colors sell for much higher than the gray, which is higher than the neon colors.- Resolution is nice- Pretty easy to understand and use- Great battery life (make sure to get the 2020 v2)- Modern ports (USB-C)- Software is good and pretty well-designed- Great selection of gamesCONS:- Apparently keeping it docked can overheat the Switch, so some recommend purchasing an adapter that plugs in to the USB-C port instead of the dock it came with- Speed is a tad slow in opening games and gameplay- Joy-cons are quite non-ergonomic - mitigated a bit by the controller you can dock them in- Easily shows fingerprints/oils and scratches

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2020
reviews.name: J Martinez
reviews.title: took a lot of refreshing to find at $299 but was worth it
reviews.review: Spent a lot of time looking to find a switch that wasn’t overpriced, and after doing lots of refreshing and looking at stock informer sites, I was finally able to purchase one. Is in perfect condition, brand new, and delivered on time! Definitely worth the wait of getting it at standard pricing, now to spend countless hours playing ACNH!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2021
reviews.name: Cavs Fan
reviews.title: Love the Switch! Great Versatility and a Great Game Catalog!
reviews.review: I really wasn’t sure if I wanted to get a Nintendo Switch. But now I love the Switch! I’m just getting into it in 2021. I was first a PC player and then just a Playstation player. I love the Switch’s versatility going from handheld to docked mode. I play mine mainly docked on my 4k monitor. The stock joycons aren’t that comfortable so I bought the Hori Split Pad controllers, and I use a Pro controller while docked. There’s also the joycon drift issue but I haven’t experienced that. The first party games on the Switch are unique from Playstation and Xbox. They give you game experiences that are unique to Nintendo. There are also good 3rd party games that have been brought to the Switch. Overall I’ve been very impressed with the Switch and it’s been the only console I’ve played for the last 3-4 months. We’ll just have to see if Nintendo brings on a revised Switch in the next year or so. I highly recommend the Switch!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2020
reviews.name: shaylah yother
reviews.title: Fast and in mostly one piece
reviews.review: One of the hinges on the docking station was broken off when I got this. Which kind of blows but besides aesthetically it doesn’t really mess with anything. It’s almost perfect. I’ve been using it just fine so clearly it wasn’t that big of a deal and functionally theres only just a slight issue when I go to open the back to take out the charger so it can travel with me but that’s not that bad. I just wish for how much it cost everything would of been together right. But it got here fast and in mostly one piece. I even put a skin on it so it really is just cosmetic.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2021
reviews.name: Mateo
reviews.title: Excelente consola
reviews.review: El producto corresponde a la descripción, muy buen precio a pesar de los impuestos acá en mi pais, el vendedor hizo el envió muy rápido y llego en perfecto estado hasta chile, a funcionado muy bien y es genial jugar en el modo portátil y después en la tv, los controles funcionan excelente y la batería esta muy bien en esta nueva versión, muy contento con mi compra, producto recomendado al igual que el vendedor Trendy- Tech y el muy buenservicio de Amazon, muchas gracias.
